headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Alien Survivals
content:
Conspiracy theorists love to say they told you so. In the case of the much-discussed Project 4808, the truthers are going to be rubbing our collective noses in it for the foreseeable future.

Alien Survivals let you play as an extraterrestrial, fighting for your life on Earth against a tide of NOOSE teams, FIB agents, and the Marines across seven maps. Keep them from killing what they do not understand, and youâ€™ll leave with 2X GTA$ and RP, all week long.
